content: the holly berry sweater is festive ruffle sweater that s perfect for christmas season this cosy and fun crochet sweater is topped with whimsical ruffles and cuffed sleeves the holly berry sweater is a top down crochet pullover so you can try it on as you crochet and alter the length to your exact measurements there are plenty of alteration suggestions in the pattern and this easy level raglan pullover has a video tutorial to help you along the way the best thing about this design is that it s not a christmas only piece and you can easily wear it year-round this pattern is accompanied by a video tutorial slightly_smiling_face sizes xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl skill level easy/intermediate check out more free crochet patterns here 1 sign up to my ** newsletter 2 ** and never miss a new crochet pattern release 1 https //forthefrills com 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4
